long_description: The Anon Scout snow helmet for boys offers top-notch protection and high style for riding anywhere on the mountain. Endura-Shell construction features an injection-molded ABS exterior for long-lasting durability and ding-resistant strength. Passive ventilation channels are integrated into the helmet and draw fresh air in the front and pull moisture out the back. Goggles ventilation channels help keep goggles clear. Classic fleece lines the interior liner and ear pads for excellent insulation and a cozy feel. Simple Fit allows riders to rock a beanie underneath their lid by simply removing the ear pads and inner liner for a skate-inspired, low-profile fit and feel. Removable goggles clip on the back of the Anon Scout girls' helmet secures goggles strap. This snow helmet complies with ASTM F 2040 and/or CE EN 1077B alpine ski and snowboard helmet safety standards.
